Interface IOfficerRegistrationRepository

All Known Implementing Classes:
CSVOfficerRegistrationRepository
public interface IOfficerRegistrationRepository
Repository interface for managing officer registrations. Follows Interface Segregation Principle by providing a focused contract for officer registration operations.

  • Method Details

    • register

      boolean register(String officerNric, int projectId)
      Registers an officer for a project.
      Parameters:
      officerNric - The NRIC of the officer
      projectId - The ID of the project
      Returns:
      true if the registration was successful, false otherwise

    • approve

      boolean approve(String officerNric, int projectId)
      Approves an officer registration.
      Parameters:
      officerNric - The NRIC of the officer
      projectId - The ID of the project
      Returns:
      true if the approval was successful, false otherwise

    • reject

      boolean reject(String officerNric, int projectId)
      Rejects an officer registration.
      Parameters:
      officerNric - The NRIC of the officer
      projectId - The ID of the project
      Returns:
      true if the rejection was successful, false otherwise

    • findPendingByOfficer

      List<Integer> findPendingByOfficer(String officerNric)
      Finds pending registrations for a specific officer.
      Parameters:
      officerNric - The NRIC of the officer
      Returns:
      A list of project IDs that the officer has pending registrations for

    • findPendingByProject

      List<String> findPendingByProject(int projectId)
      Finds pending registrations for a specific project.
      Parameters:
      projectId - The ID of the project
      Returns:
      A list of officer NRICs that have pending registrations for the project

    • hasPendingRegistration

      boolean hasPendingRegistration(String officerNric, int projectId)
      Checks if an officer has a pending registration for a specific project.
      Parameters:
      officerNric - The NRIC of the officer
      projectId - The ID of the project
      Returns:
      true if the officer has a pending registration for the project, false otherwise

    • getPendingRegistrationCount

      int getPendingRegistrationCount(int projectId)
      Gets the count of pending registrations for a specific project.
      Parameters:
      projectId - The ID of the project
      Returns:
      The number of pending registrations for the project
